desc: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
title: Process can elevate its own privileges

desc: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
title: Default capabilities not dropped

desc: 'runAsNonRoot' forces the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
title: Runs as root user

desc: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
title: Root file system is not read-only

desc: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
title: Runs with low user ID

desc: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
title: Runs with low group ID

desc: Disable anonymous requests to the API server.
title: Ensure that the --anonymous-auth argument is set to false

desc: Verify kubelet's certificate before establishing connection.
title: Ensure that the --kubelet-certificate-authority argument is set as appropriate

desc: Limit the rate at which the API server accepts requests.
title: Ensure that the admission control plugin EventRateLimit is set

desc: The SecurityContextDeny admission controller can be used to deny pods which make use of some SecurityContext fields which could allow for privilege escalation in the cluster. This should be used where PodSecurityPolicy is not in place within the cluster.
title: Ensure that the admission control plugin SecurityContextDeny is set if PodSecurityPolicy is not used

desc: Disable profiling, if not needed.
title: Ensure that the --profiling argument is set to false

desc: Enable auditing on the Kubernetes API Server and set the desired audit log path.
title: Ensure that the --audit-log-path argument is set

desc: Retain the logs for at least 30 days or as appropriate.
title: Ensure that the --audit-log-maxage argument is set to 30 or as appropriate

desc: Retain 10 or an appropriate number of old log files.
title: Ensure that the --audit-log-maxbackup argument is set to 10 or as appropriate

desc: Rotate log files on reaching 100 MB or as appropriate.
title: Ensure that the --audit-log-maxsize argument is set to 100 or as appropriate

desc: Setup TLS connection on the API server.
title: Ensure that the --client-ca-file argument is set as appropriate

desc: etcd should be configured to make use of TLS encryption for client connections.
title: Ensure that the --etcd-cafile argument is set as appropriate

desc: The RuntimeDefault/Localhost seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
title: Default Seccomp profile not set

desc: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE

desc: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
title: Default capabilities not dropped

desc: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
title: CPU not limited

desc: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
title: Root file system is not read-only

desc: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
title: CPU requests not specified

desc: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
title: Memory requests not specified

desc: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
title: Memory not limited

desc: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
title: Runs with low user ID

desc: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
title: Runs with low group ID

desc: The RuntimeDefault/Localhost seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
title: Default Seccomp profile not set

desc: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE

desc: ensure that User pods are not placed in kube-system namespace
title: User Pods should not be placed in kube-system namespace
